baseline_groups.claim_summary: Sports club vouchers for primary school children in Saxony increase long-run sports club membership relative to children in Brandenburg and Thuringia.
baseline_groups.notes: Single baseline: TWFE with year+state+city FE, clustered at city, no controls, main sample 2006-2010. Coef=0.0089, p=0.635.

global_notes: 84 total specs. Many use different outcome variables that measure different constructs than sports club membership.
